oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Various Song Excerpts - Old museum music row location - Artist Gallery exhibition
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Various recording excerpts of performances featuring Roy Acuff (performer)' Bill Anderson (performer), Eddy Arnold (performer), Gene Autry (performer), Johnny Bond (performer), Elton Britt (performer), Jimmie Rodgers (performer), The Carter Family (performer), Johnny Cash (performer), Patsy Cline (performer), Cowboy Copas (performer), Vernon Dalhart (performer), Skeeter Davis (performer), Jimmy Dean (performer), Bing Crosby (performer), Ernest Tubb (performer), Jim Reeves (performer), Tennessee Ernie Ford (performer), Lefty Frizzell (performer), Roy Orbison (performer), Homer and Jethro (performance group), Johnny Horton (performer), Ferlin Husky (performer), Sonny James (performer), Bill Monroe (performer), George Jones (performer), Hank Thompson (performer), Pee Wee King (performer), Hank Locklin (performer), Roger Miller (performer), Vince Gill (performer), Wilf Carter (performer), Buck Owens (performer), Webb Pierce (performer), Ray Price (performer), Jim Reeves (performer), Tex Ritter (performer), Guy Mitchell (performer), Walter Brennan (performer), Jimmie Rodgers (performer), Porter Wagoner (performer), Carl Smith (performer), Roy Rogers (performer), Bill Monroe (performer), Jim Reeves (performer), Kitty Wells (performer), Slim Whitman (performer), The Wilburn Brothers (performance group), Hank Williams Sr. (performer), Merle Haggard (performer), Faron Young (performer) and other unidentified performers.
